description: This file defines and configures a team of AI agents for market analysis, including their models, tools, and instructions, and initiates a task to analyze the semiconductor market.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific capabilities, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with coordination and management capabilities.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class for the Claude AI model from Anthropic.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and inference tasks.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval and analysis.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response generated by the team leader based on the task.
